body: Forgot to do this, but ask me any question.
body_tagged: Forgot to do this, but ask me any question.
title: Voltdrive's Avicore AMA

replies.body:
We all know the drill xP

1. What's your favorite color and why?
2. If you had one wish to benefit yourself (No donating to charity or anything), what would it be?
3. What do you think the meaning of existence is?
4. Can you easily do 56/24 in your head? (In under 10 seconds)
5. Is your power level over 9000? 
6. If you were a food, what would you be and why?
7. If you were to use a common household object to fight in the zombie appocolypse (Microwave, chair, et cetera), what would it be and why?
8. If you could choose to be an animal and still had the power to morph back into a human any time you wanted, what would it be and why?
replies.body_tagged:
We all know the drill xP

1. What's your favorite color and why?
2. If you had one wish to benefit yourself (No donating to charity or anything), what would it be?
3. What do you think the meaning of existence is?
4. Can you easily do 56/24 in your head? (In under 10 seconds)
5. Is your power level over 9000? 
6. If you were a food, what would you be and why?
7. If you were to use a common household object to fight in the zombie appocolypse (Microwave, chair, et cetera), what would it be and why?
8. If you could choose to be an animal and still had the power to morph back into a human any time you wanted, what would it be and why?

replies.body:
1. What's your favorite color and why?: Blue, because it is.
2. If you had one wish to benefit yourself (No donating to charity or anything), what would it be?: Me getting diamond rank.
3. What do you think the meaning of existence is?: 42
4. Can you easily do 56/24 in your head? (In under 10 seconds) If the answer isn't 1.33...then no.
5. Is your power level over 9000?: It's over 9,000,000!
6. If you were a food, what would you be and why?: Lima beans, because no one wants to eat that shiz.
7. If you were to use a common household object to fight in the zombie appocolypse (Microwave, chair, et cetera), what would it be and why?: Steak knife. it's a good utensil.
8. If you could choose to be an animal and still had the power to morph back into a human any time you wanted, what would it be and why?: T-rex. I can stomp Tokyo to bits now.

8. If you could choose to be an animal and still had the power to morph back into a human any time you wanted, what would it be and why?: T-rex. I can stomp Tokyo to bits now.

replies.body: Would you ever be interesting in meeting me, EpicDonutDevour, mkd04, Butter_BrosMC, bobert8080, tacomermaid, and GoldenWalrus? :3

replies.body:
Very interesting responses; thank you! :3
Also, you're close, it's 2.33 xD
